en.title: New Cabinet sworn in
body_lines: MP Dr. Weli Amarasuriya was sworn in before President Anura Kumara Dissanayake at the Presidential Secretariat today (24) at the Presidential Secretariat.

summary_lines: Dr. Weli Amarasuriya sworn in as MP before President Anura Kumara Dissanayake at Presidential Secretariat on 24th.
